00023 #ifndef Precond_base_included
00024 #define Precond_base_included
00025 
00026 #include <Objet_U.h>
00027 
00028 class DoubleVect;
00029 class Matrice_Base;
00030 class Champ_Inc_base;
00031 
00032 class Precond_base : public Objet_U
00033 {
00034   Declare_base_sans_constructeur(Precond_base);
00035 public:
00036 // Order is important (we test for example if status_>=REINIT_COEFF)
00037   enum Init_Status { READY = 0, REINIT_COEFF = 1, REINIT_ALL = 2 };
00038 
00039   Precond_base();
00040 
00041   void   reinit(Init_Status x = REINIT_ALL);
00042   void   set_echange_espace_virtuel_resultat(int flag);
00043   int preconditionner(const Matrice_Base&, const DoubleVect& src, DoubleVect& solution);
00044   void   prepare(const Matrice_Base&, const DoubleVect& src);
00045 
00046   virtual int supporte_matrice_morse_sym();
00047   Init_Status    get_status()
00048   {
00049     return status_;
00050   };
00051 // Call this to know if "src" must have an updated virtual space before calling preconditionner
00052   virtual int get_flag_updated_input() const
00053   {
00054     return 1;
00055   }
00056 protected:
00057 // implementations of preconditionner_ must take care of echange_ev_solution_ and update
00058 // the virtual space if needed.
00059   virtual int preconditionner_(const Matrice_Base&, const DoubleVect& src, DoubleVect& solution) = 0;
00060   virtual void   prepare_(const Matrice_Base&, const DoubleVect&);
00061 
00062 // Should the preconditionner_ method update the virtual space of the result ?
00063   int echange_ev_solution_;
00064 
00065 private:
00066   Init_Status status_;
00067 };
00068 
00069 #endif
